title: Legacy (Normandy) Heartbeat, via Nimbus
description: The schema for the Legacy Heartbeat Nimbus feature.

survey.$comment: Hearbeat arguments are nested under survey to prevent simultaneous rollouts and experiments from overriding eachothers optional variables

repeatOption.description: Determines how often a prompt is shown executes.

repeatEvery.description: For repeatOption=xdays, how often (in days) the prompt is displayed.

includeTelemetryUUID.description: Include unique user ID in post-answer-url and Telemetry

surveyId.description: Slug uniquely identifying this survey in telemetry

message.description: Message to show to the user

engagementButtonLabel.description: Text for the engagement button. If specified, this button will be shown instead of rating stars.

thanksMessage.description: Thanks message to show to the user after they've rated Firefox

postAnswerUrl.description: URL to redirect the user to after rating Firefox or clicking the engagement button

learnMoreMessage.description: Message to show to the user to learn more

learnMoreUrl.description: URL to show to the user when they click Learn More
